#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

int64_t ShardKvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

int ShardKvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  // lab_shard: fill in your code
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  if(op_id_map_.find(to_string(oid)) != op_id_map_.end()){
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);


  uint64_t index, term;
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> m = static_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
  bool ret = GetRaftServer().Start(m, &index, &term);
  if (!ret){
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  int timeout = 10000000;
  while(timeout){
    if (op_id_map_.find(to_string(oid)) != op_id_map_.end() && op_id_map_[to_string(oid)]){
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
    Coroutine::Sleep(100000);
    timeout -= 100000;
  }
  return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

int ShardKvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    if(op_id_map_.find(to_string(oid)) != op_id_map_.end()){
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back("append");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    s->data_.push_back(v);


    uint64_t index, term;
    shared_ptr<Marshallable> m = static_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
    bool ret = GetRaftServer().Start(m, &index, &term);
    if (!ret){
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }
   int timeout = 10000000;
    while(timeout){
      if (op_id_map_.find(to_string(oid)) != op_id_map_.end() && op_id_map_[to_string(oid)]){
        return KV_SUCCESS;
      }
      Coroutine::Sleep(100000);
      timeout -= 100000;
    }
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

int ShardKvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    if(op_id_map_.find(to_string(oid)) != op_id_map_.end()){
      // *v = get_map_[k];
      *v = kv_store_[k];
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back("get");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    s->data_.push_back("");


    uint64_t index, term;
    shared_ptr<Marshallable> m = static_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
    bool ret = GetRaftServer().Start(m, &index, &term);
    if (!ret){


      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }
    int timeout = 10000000;
    while(timeout){
      if (op_id_map_.find(to_string(oid)) != op_id_map_.end() && op_id_map_[to_string(oid)]){
        *v = kv_store_[k];
        return KV_SUCCESS;
      }
      Coroutine::Sleep(100000);
      timeout -= 100000;
    }
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

void ShardKvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
    auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable *)(&m);
    if(op_id_map_.find(v->data_[0]) != op_id_map_.end()){
      return;
    }
    if (v->data_[1] == "put"){
      kv_store_[v->data_[2]] = v->data_[3];
    }
    else if (v->data_[1] == "append"){
      kv_store_[v->data_[2]] += v->data_[3];
    }
    op_id_map_[v->data_[0]] = true;
}

shared_ptr<ShardKvClient> ShardKvServer::CreateClient(Communicator* comm) {
  auto cli = make_shared<ShardKvClient>();
  cli->commo_ = comm;
  verify(cli->commo_ != nullptr);
  static uint32_t id = 0;
  id++;
  cli->cli_id_ = id; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
